pullRequest.title: Add Listing page fixes for Service Catalog
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR fixes wso2/product-apim#9510
The following service listing is populated with sample data.
Listing

Edit Service

Delete Service

nodes.bodyText:
Let's use useIntl  hook instead of this old style injectIntl HOC here
import { useIntl } from 'react-intl';
With this useIntl Usage of injectIntl is redundant and hasn't used the props passed from this HOC(Higher-order component) also.So shall we remove the injectIntl thinngs

+/**
+* Service Catalog service delete
+* @param {any} props Props for delete function.
+* @returns {any} Returns the rendered UI for service delete.
+*/
+function Delete(props) {
+    const intl = useIntl();

nodes.bodyText:
This set of properties (or in short props) are the parameters that external component can engage with this Delete component, In other words, this act as the interface for this Delete component(if we look at it in OOP corner)
Ie : if Delete is a class serviceName, serviceId, getData are like constructor arguments.
Delete(serviceName, serviceId, getData)
So my point here is, For this Delete component getData kind of function property is not appropriate.
Usually, the component states are event-driven like, onChange, onClose, onSubmit, etc so it's better to have an event handler like onDelete and implement the onDelete handler in parent component.
Delete component should ask for user content and if the user confirms the action it should trigger the onDelete handler
Please avoid using injectIntl

nodes.bodyText: Similar to above Delete component, Here also we can make this Edit component controlled by its parent by exposing an onEdit kind of handler. IMO we don't need getData  here
I think this initialState state is not needed in this component

Can't we extract mock values from OAS definition, Or shall we move this to API data level so that we know once the REST API is ready it's only that API file we need to change in order to wire the actual API

This switch can be simplified as below
     .
     .
        case 'serviceUrl':
        case 'definitionType':
            return { ...state, [field]: value };
because in both cases return { ...state, [field]: value }; return statements are same
can we set name and displayName  fields with the same value all the time, like are they both get changed at the same time always ?
As mention above I think it's better to invoke a onEdit function here and pass this promise updateServicePromise object to it, So it can handle what to do in case of a failure or success save

I think this prop will prevent closing the dialog box with the escape key, Shall we allow this action ? it's ok to allow users to close the edit box if they don't want to make any change after looking at it or want to discard the changed if they want
I think having multiple <DialogContent>s inside a dialog is wrong, If you need to add a padding(spacing) between two elements use Grid spacing
injectIntl  😃
Same as below, Let's move this to a separate styles file
😨  no class components please, Shall we make this a function component.

This is the problem with class components, wrapper hell 😢

. . . If you look at a typical React application in React DevTools, you will likely find a “wrapper hell” of components surrounded by layers of providers, consumers, higher-order components, render props, and other abstractions.

~source

nodes.bodyText: this last then callback has no effect at all 😃  , I mean this is equal passing just promisedServices without attaching that then callback
Let's try to avoid this library when the table view is quite simple, Otherwise, this adds unnecessary complexity to code

commit.message: Service Catalog Listing UI Implementation Part 1
Add review fixes for onboarding dashboard
Add listing page fixes for service catalog
Add delete functionality to service listing page
Change search functionality in listing UI
Add service editting functionality for service catalog
Add form validation for edit UI

beforeCommit.message: Add service editting functionality for service catalog

afterCommit.message: Add form validation for edit UI

commit.message: Move onEdit and onDelete calls to parent component
Remove initial state from Edit view
Add display name field to the edit dialog
Change columns of the listing table
Change Listing class component to a functional component
